*gen_grbl-esp32.machineDescription: A template for machines equipped with GRBL-ESP32 controllers

settings.gcodeStart:
$Spindle/Type=LASER
G21       ; Set units to mm
G90       ; Absolute positioning
M4 S0     ; Laser on, zero power
settings.gcodeMillStart:
$Spindle/Type=PWM
G21       ; Set units to mm
G90       ; Absolute positioning
M3 S0     ; Spindle on, zero power
settings.gcodeEnd:
M5        ; Switch Laser off
M2        ; End
settings.gcodeMillEnd:
M5        ; Switch Spindle off
M2        ; End
